Room.Text: *I'm sitting in a grey chair there's a box pointing at me
*I'm on a ledge outside of a window high above the reactor core
Control room surronding the reactor core

ADVENT.Message: Good morning Mr. Phelps. Your Mission (should you decide to accept it) is to prevent this automated nuclear reactor from being destroyed by a saboteur's TIME BOMB!
There's a Bright flash and I hear something fall to the floor. I can't see what it is from here though.
* B O O O O O O O O O M ! * * * * * *

The saboteur (who also rewired the security system) is a heart patient. He plans to SUICIDE with the reactor! He is still loosein the building. You'll find Security keys and a map in the manila envelope lying next to the tape player.
Most doors and windows are under automated security control.
The door opens just long enough for me to scurry through.
I'm on the 2nd floor. Below I see the control room surronding the reactor core. There's a wide ledge just under the window.
In this Adventure there's NO score. Either you make it or ...
Tell me with what? Example: `WITH FIST`
Recorder goes flying thru the glass landing in the control room.Boy what a MESS!
Click! Room lights dim and a screen drops from the ceiling. You hear a hidden projector start.
The screen illuminates for awhile, but no movie!?
The projector stops, the screen rises, and the lights return.
A movie runs telling about the reactor and its construction interesting highlights: 1) Plastic DEFORMS strangely in radiation 2) Even short exposure to HIGH radiation is LETHAL, so suit up
The radiation did something to my pail!
doesn't provide much protection for me as I fall down retching I hear/FEEL THE BOMB explode!
Welcome to Adventure number 3 'MISSION IMPOSSIBLE' by Scott Adams, Dedicated to Maegen Adams.
Something won't fit thru the door.
I turn the knob and push
the water spills on the bomb and
the control panel which immediately shorts out triggering the bomb
defuses it! FANTASTIC, You completed an IMPOSSIBLE mission!
the water soaks into the floor
say again and use a color!
I'm looking into the control room. I notice that the door is blocked by some debris.
In the distance you hear a dull thud; as if someone fell or dropped something heavy.
Oh Boy...I think I did something...
I don't know where to look
Its a seamless box with 1 small hole for the red wire.
TV camera is slow scanning the window area.
It seems safe. Shall I sit down?
Only help I can think of is to: 'Examine everything closely!'
A minute ago someone ran out of this room! By the way I seem to be carrying something!
Someone came in the room, he saw me and ran out!
Hi! Look for Adventure number 4: 'VOODOO CASTLE' at your favorite computer store! (Now back to our current program.)

Item.Text: Bomb detector flashing yellow (bomb is now armed)
Box with apparatus pointing at chair
Row of 4 buttons -red white blue yellow-
Surgically implanted bomb detector glows green (bomb's -safe-)
Bomb detector glowing red (final countdown active)
Closed white door with tv camera mounted over it
Plate glass window with embeded red wires
Red wire going from bomb into wall
Sign `No beverages, Please use Break Room.`
Yellow door with tv camera over it
Metal door jammed partially open by remains of a tape recorder
Blue door with tv camera over it
Plain metal door with sign -control room-
Loose red wire going into wall
Steps leading down into the reactor core
